name: arsonist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who intentionally starts a fire in order to damage or destroy something, especially a building: Police are blaming arsonists for the spate of fires in the Greenfields housing estate. Investigators believe an arsonist set the wildfires that burned 20,000 acres of land. See
arson
More examplesFewer examplesThe building was destroyed by arsonists. Last November, arsonists set fire to a new wing of the school.Authorities are hunting for the arsonists suspected of starting dozens of fires in the region.Arsonists continue to be the biggest source of forest fires.
